JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: bodywork technicians for vehicles / sheet metal workers
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Ambitious bodywork technicians for vehicles / sheet metal workers are wanted for car workshops in Haderslev, Odense and Haslev – Denmark.

The car work shop offers several different exciting and challenging tasks of replacing car body parts, repairing damages, or become a specialist in work on veteran and special vehicles.

There is a good variation in your tasks, so that the days do not just flow together with monotonous removal and installation tasks. The company has new and modern equipment for the demanding body work, and there is a high focus on safety and well-being.

We expect you to:

  • Educated body technician or sheet metal worker - Alternatively, you have other relevant education supplemented by relevant courses
  • Can work independently
  • Can provide work of high standard
  • Can perform self-inspection
  • Can meet deadlines.

We offer you:

  • Salary according to qualifications + tax-free supplements (approx. 4500-5500 Euro paid after tax, calculated on being in Denmark for about a month and working 6 days a week) 
  • Bonus (Quarterly bonus)
  • Contribution to pension
  • Health insurance

The focus is on making everyday life and the process of bodywork easier for all customers. What we offer our customers is flexibility, mobility and service. The company has an ambition to be Denmark's leading body service.

If you dream of a new job where you do not compromise on quality and service, then apply for the position now. Once you have applied for the position, we will get back to you. Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis, and access to the position is as soon as possible.
